ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle cola-flavored carbonated beverage
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle chile sauce

gear.name: Dutch oven or baking dish with lid

cookingTips: The cola acts as a tenderizer while adding subtle sweetness to complement the savory onion soup mix
Arrange brisket fat-side up to allow rendered fat to baste the meat naturally
Let the finished brisket rest for 10 minutes before slicing against the grain
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do the acidic cola and umami-rich soup mix work together to tenderize and flavor the brisket?
